text:
Hi all, when you’re building a new HubSpot site for somebody who already has HubSpot, how do you go about building it?

Do you build the templates and then update the existing page but don’t save it and once you’re ready to go live then publish?
Build out the new templates then use content staging to create the pages: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cms-general/redesign-and-relaunch-your-site-with-content-staging>
